Animate - Class in animation
Description:

Different images are animated based on orientation and sequence

Different methods of animations include utilizing: different files for different frames corresponding to each image spritesheets that are divided into quadrangles .gif files that are displayed based on orientation

Animate() - Constructor for class animation.Animate
 
animate(GameObject) - Static method in class animation.Animate
Displays different images based on their orientations
Each frame of corresponding image is displayed consecutively
animate() - Method in class animation.Animation
Animation is displayed using specific coordinates of original image
animate() - Method in class animation.ProjectileAnimation
plays series of frames based on orientation and dimensions
animateGem(Player) - Static method in class animation.Animate
Retrieves different frames of image from spritesheet
Divides spritesheet into equal quadrangles corresponding to individual frames
animateWithGif(MovableObject) - Static method in class animation.Animate
Displays .gif animaions based on their corresponding orientations
animation - package animation
 
Animation - Class in animation
Description:
Different images are animated based on orientation and sequence
Animation(MovableObject) - Constructor for class animation.Animation

AnimationParameters - Class in animation
Description:

Responsible for calling and defining methods for different .gif files

Parameters are placed to control size of animated images
AnimationParameters() - Constructor for class animation.AnimationParameters
 
applyDamage(int, int, GameObject) - Method in class gameObject.GameObject
Applies damage to character

Inputs:
value - amount of damage
invincibleDuration - time in which the character does not receive damage
target - target object

Inputs:
value - amount of damage
invincibleDuration - time in which the character does not receive damage
target - target object
